content.text:
# Draft:List of Apple Devices and Compatible Software Versions

This article provides detailed tables documenting the compatibility between various Apple products including iPhones, iPads, Macs, Apple Watches, and other hardware and their supported operating system and software versions. Compatibility information covers major releases of iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS, illustrating which devices can run or upgrade to specific versions.
iOS
